tip_waiter: Would you like to tip your waiter?
can_we_assist: How can we assist you today? Please select an option below.
order_your_food: Order your favourite food or drink.
your_food_description: Craving something delicious? Enjoy the flavors you love, delivered with just a few taps. Stress-free dining, every time. Orderly
explore_menu_description: Discover a world of flavors, crafted with care and passion. Our chefs select only the finest ingredients to bring you a delightful culinary experience. Whether you're craving something savory or sweet, our menu has something to satisfy every appetite.
order_placed: Your order has been placed successfully.
order_placed_description_first: We are preparing your delicious meal, and it will be served at your table shortly.
order_placed_description_2: If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to let us know.
special_instructions_placeholder: Any special requests or dietary requirements for the entire order?
remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
clear_cart_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove all items from your cart?
